reviewText: Is there a song more powerfully patriotic than Lee Greenwood's "God bless the USA"?  During the Gulf War and since September 11, this song has been the anthem of Americans who love their country.  This video is a chore to find but it contains music and footage that will touch your heart.  Take this to your next Fourth of July celebration and touch the hearts of those present.  I guarantee there will not be a dry eye in the room.
